title: Whatever Happened To Our Listener Who Accidentally Accepted The Wrong Job?
description:
Remember our listener who accidentally accepted the wrong job? She called us the morning she was supposed to start freaking out! The job involved her working with senior citizens, but she had NO CLUE what she was doing. 
Is she still working there or not? We have an update!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
